frost_blink.name: Frost Blink
frost_blink.description: A quick burst of icy mist envelops Neva as she vanishes, reappearing a short distance away with frost trailing in her wake; Can be used as bonus action or reaction; As reaction: Make INT save vs incoming attack; Success: Teleport and avoid attack; Failure: Teleport but still take attack; Gain advantage on saves when used as reaction

glacial_recharge.name: Glacial Recharge
glacial_recharge.description: Neva channels her connection to ice magic, drawing from her spiritual essence. Her body momentarily radiates intense cold as she replenishes her power, frost patterns spreading across her skin; Usable even at 0 MP; Creates small patches of ice around Neva; Minor temperature drop in immediate area

shattered_ground.name: Shattered Ground
shattered_ground.description: Neva channels ice magic into the ground, creating improvised structures that match her aggressive style; Create during movement: Ramps (5 ft high, +5 ft to jumps), Walls (5 ft high, can be shattered), Spikes (1d4 cold damage on contact); +5 ft movement while active; Can wall-run on ice formations

deadlock_chains.name: Deadlock Chains
deadlock_chains.description: Manifesting chains of black ice from her hands, each link jagged and threatening; Pull herself to surfaces (15 ft); Grab and pull enemies (10 ft); Swing enemies in arc (1d4 to other targets); Grants advantage on next grapple; Special: Applies 1 Frostbite stack on grab

rippers_guard.name: Ripper's Guard
rippers_guard.description: Ice shards swirl around Neva like a frozen mosh pit, becoming more intense with each hit she takes; Gain Spike counter when hit (max 3); Each Spike reduces damage by 1d4; Can shatter Spikes when landing wrestling moves: Each Spike: 1d6 cold damage in 5 ft radius; Applies 1 Frostbite stack per Spike; Creates difficult terrain

breakdown.name: Breakdown
breakdown.description: Neva forms rough chunks of ice in her palms, then violently smashes them together. The impact creates a spray of jagged, glass-like shards that spray forward in an erratic pattern; Shattering nearby ice formations adds more shards; Special: Applies 1 Frostbite stack if at least half the shards hit

frostborne_frenzy.name: Frostborne Frenzy
frostborne_frenzy.description: A brutal combination of ice-enhanced strikes, mixing quick jabs with headbutts and knee strikes; Each hit applies 1 Frostbite stack; Final hit launches opponent if they have 2+ Frostbite stacks; Can be canceled into wrestling moves; Special: If all hits land, gain advantage on next wrestling move

cheap_shot.name: Cheap Shot
cheap_shot.description: Neva creates a patch of black ice at her opponent's feet, causing them to slip and stumble forward; Target must make DEX save or be knocked prone; Creates difficult terrain in 5 ft radius; Can chain into heavy attacks against prone targets; Special: Applies 1 Frostbite stack on knockdown

spike_breaker.name: Spike Breaker
spike_breaker.description: An angled pillar of jagged ice erupts from the ground, serving as both launcher and temporary platform; Creates temporary elevated platform; Can be shattered for area damage; Perfect setup for aerial wrestling moves; Special: Extra damage to airborne targets
